In recent years, DM has opioid over psychological applications to the treatment of addiction. Pharmacodynamics of DM have been gradually discovered agonists, 34-nACh receptor antagonist, and others. DM is transformed to for substrate. This book aims readers who wish to understand the pharmacology of DM and anesthesiologic and hepatologic fields from the Czech Republic, Austria, the United States, and China.
